channel.title: Help with sitting on chair [read for more info]

item.title: Help with sitting on chair [read for more info]
item.dc:creator: @ectophantom ectophantom
item.description:
@ectophantom wrote:

All you need to do, is search for makeglobalobject in client.java, copy a line and edit the object ID and put the co-ordinates of where you want the chair, then, make a teleport command to those coordinates, use that command, then use the sit command.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with sitting on chair [read for more info]

item.title: Help with sitting on chair [read for more info]
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

you would need a client. Then edit the model “chair” in a client, then make it say “sit” on chair and when a player clicks “sit” you sit on the chair useing a emote.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with sitting on chair [read for more info]
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

hi there, i need a way to make it so you can sit in a chair . i got a command that you sit in mid air this is it
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“sit”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
pEmote = 2939;
}

im trying to make it so it does this command but on a chair. need help on this completely blank------
pls post if you know what to do or have something like this
pls dont spam just trying to find out if you can do this or not
